CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 11, 1967, pg. 13, reads: "CONGRATULATIONS - Pittsburgh Branch NAACP President Atty. Byrd R. Brown, congratulates Rose Marie Payne and wishes her good luck in her new position. Mrs. Payne, who has served at the NAACP office for the past several month [years] is leaving to accept another position."Accompanying article reads: "An overflow crowd packed the main ballroom of the Pick-Roosevelt Hotel recently when the Women's Auxiliary of the Pittsburgh Branch  NAACP sponsored its second annual "Daisy E. Lampkin Award" Dinner-Dance..."
TitMainTitle: Byrd Brown and Rose Marie Mitchell Payne, at Women's Auxiliary of NAACP dinner dance, Roosevelt Hotel
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Roosevelt Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brown, Byrd, 1929-National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.
